meanings.definition: Having a face or facial expression.
meanings.sent1: The friendly dog had a visaged smile that lit up the room.
meanings.sent2: She approached with a visaged look of concern on her face.
meanings.sent3: The visaged sun peeked through the clouds, as if smiling down on the world.
meanings.sent4: The old tree had a visaged bark that seemed to tell stories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The visaged moon shone brightly in the night sky, casting a gentle glow.

meanings.definition: Having a specified kind of face or facial expression.
meanings.sent1: The visaged clown at the party made everyone laugh with his colorful makeup.
meanings.sent2: The visaged statue in the park had a serene expression that captivated onlookers.
meanings.sent3: The visaged pumpkin on the porch seemed to be grinning mischievously on Halloween night.
meanings.sent4: Her visaged painting captured the essence of joy in every stroke.
meanings.sent5: The visaged mask at the masquerade ball hid the true identity of the wearer.
